name: Vampire
desc: He just wants your blood.

name: Gremlin
desc: Full of mischief.

name: Davy Jones
desc: Spirit of the sea ready to collect your soul.

name: Chupacabra
desc: Large creature that thirsts for your blood.

name: Manticore
desc: Body of a lion, head of a man, tail of a scorpion.

name: Banshee
desc: She has a deadly scream.

name: Poltergeist
desc: This ghost will haunt your home.

name: Nessie
desc: The monster of Loch Ness.

name: Jersey Devil
desc: Head of a horse, wings like a dragon.

name: Headless Horseman
desc: He lost his head and now he wants yours.

name: Zombie
desc: These undead only follow their hunger for your flesh.

name: Yeti
desc: Hidden in the snowy mountains.

name: Mummy
desc: You were warned not to disturb their rest.

name: Orc
desc: Big, powerful, and ugly.

name: Kraken
desc: Giant sea squid with a taste for ships.

name: Golem
desc: Human made of clay.

name: Werewolf
desc: Sometimes a man, sometimes a fearsome wolf creature.

name: Cerberus
desc: Vicious three headed dog.

name: Siren
desc: Their song will lead you to only death.

name: Succubus
desc: She will drain the life from any man.

name: Cyclops
desc: Don't stare at his eye. It only makes him angry.

name: Fankenstein's Monster
desc: Big and powerful. He just wants to be left alone.

name: Swamp Creature
desc: He awaits you in the swamp.
